description: Swindon Town twice threw away the lead as Kelly N'mai's equaliser earns Salford City a 2-2 draw.
title: Swindon Town 2-2 Salford City
title_page: Swindon Town 2-2 Salford City: Robins twice surrender lead to draw - BBC Sport
maintext:
Swindon Town are winless across their last three league games against Salford City (D2 L1) since a 2-1 win at the Peninsula Stadium in February 2023.
After winning the reverse fixture 2-1 in October last year, Salford city will be looking to claim a first ever Football League double over Swindon Town.
Swindon are unbeaten in eight home league games (W6 D2), their longest such run since going 12 without defeat from October 2019 to March 2020.
Salford have lost more of their last four away league games (3) than they had in their first 12 on the road in League Two this season beforehand (2). The Ammies could suffer three successive away league defeats for the first time since September 2021 (run of 4).
